=== Test Plan ===

* Install latest (trusty-proposed) image on desktop
* Install freshly build MPs that are needed for landing
* On the desktop
** Ensure man pages are searchable in the Dash
*** Open the Dash and type "man:unity"
*** Ensure the Unity man page is listed
** Ensure man pages can be opened from the Dash
*** Open the Dash and type "man:unity"
*** Open the preview and click on "Open"
*** Ensure that the Unity man page is opened in a Help window
